'''''Parma Eldalamberon 4''''' is the fourth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|3|5}}

==Contents==
* Cover — Farley

* Columns
** "''Beth-Luis-Nion''" — [[Paula Marmor]]
** "Tales from the Little Old Bookmaker" — Jim Vibber

* Articles
** "A Survey of some English Tengwar Orthographies" — Larry Krieg
** "The Naming of ''Tor'' and ''Tinidril''" — [[Jim Allan]]
** "The Origins of the Pidgin Gurspel Language" — David Strecker
** "Initial Consonant Mutation in Celtic and Sindarin" — complied by Paula Marmor, Larry Krieg, and David Strecker
** "Tengwar Fact Sheet and Guide" — Larry Krieg

* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: [[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 4 backcover.png|Part of "In the Willow-meads of Tasarinan"]] — calligraphy by Jim Vibber
